attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in these difficult times where many private sector employees have volunteered or been forced to take pay cuts (not to mention those who actually find themselves out of work) it only seems fair that public sector workers stand by the people who pay their wages and do likewise. this will go a long way to maintaining public services and significantly aid the repayment of the national debt in as shorter time as possible.
